The only way for it to stop is to give me 1 million dollars! Once there, I'll stop the bomb. So 1 million or Bomb explosion! Snaptrap out!

12.content: how does kitty gain weight
12.title: fat cat

121.content: Kitty went back to her house and started eating. She ate, and then she weighed 300. She could still move. "Boy, I want to keep eating and eating and eating," she said. She ate for days, 4 weeks, and 2 months until, she got super duper fat, she can't move anymore. She became a kitty blob. "What happened to Agent K-k-k-k-katswell, Chief?" said Keswick. "Did you find her, Agent Puppy?" asked the Chief. "Not yet, but keep searching!" said Dudley. Kitty was still super duper fat. Her butt was as big as her head, her legs got up, she got 1000 chins, her belly was so huge, she spoke in a really really deep voice. She was still eating, but she was so fat, all her furniture had broke. Back at T.U.F.F, "Attention, T.U.F.F.! It is I, Verminous Snaptrap, with another super diabolical plan to rule Petropolis! Without Agent Katswell, you're all doomed! (evil laugh) "But boss," Ollie said "you don't have one yet,"Oh, sorry. You'll be fine now that I... Wait, stop it. Snaptrap out!" he said. "Ok. What's going on here, Keswick?" The Chief asked. "Well M-maybe we should be able to stop Snaptrap before h-h-he tries to stop us," Keswick said. At D.O.O.M... "You know boss, maybe you should tell them the truth," Francisco said. "No I don't," Snatptrap said "I wanted to keep it a secret." "Secrets are special, you know," Larry said. "Shut up, Larry!" Snaptrap throws Larry in the Shark Tank. "AAAAHHHHHH!!!!!!!!!" Larry screamed. "If I did tell them the truth, I'll be arrested," Snaptrap criticized. "I got an idea." he said. "Maybe if I tie T.U.F.F up, they won't notice." "That's perfect boss," Ollie said. "Then you won't tell them your secret."
121.title: eating binge

choices: kitty and dudley try to use their newfound size and strength.
kitty and dudley become hungry and go on an eating binge.
snaptrap shows up and steals keswick's weight gain ray.
122.content:
it was just another day at tuff headquarters in petropolis, and as usual the chief of tuff headquarters was doing paperwork dudley puppy was goofing off and kitty katswell was on her computer like always until keswick tuff's resident scientist and inventor decided to show off his brand new weight gain ray.

keswick: may i have your attention please? fellow tuff agents i'd like to show you my newest invention, the weight gain ray.Now i know all you're wondering how this device i invented works, well i'll show you all it works by asking for a volunteer or two.

Then dudley puppy spoke up and said to keswick.

dudley puppy: keswick i'll gladly volunteer for your little science project and so will kitty

kitty katswell: dudley are you crazy? oh all right i'll do it too kitty grumbled to herself.

keswick: okay i'm going to fire the weight gain ray at you both.Here goes nothing keswick said.

And so he fired the weight gain ray at dudley puppy and kitty katswell instantly fattening them up even ripping off their clothes in the process as they were putting on so much weight until keswick stopped firing.

keswick: agents katswell and puppy how are both of you feeling? and are you guys okay?

kitty katswell: i feel great and look at how much weight i've put on thanks keswick for using this weight gain ray on me.

dudley puppy: keswick i'm humongus and i feel great also i think i've practially outgrown my clothes.

that was until...
122.title: Keswick's new weight gain ray device

124.content: All the villains in town had banded together in a giant meeting to stop TUFF. For hours they debated what they could and should do to stop the agency once and for all. Eventually they came to the conclusion that they failed most of the time form the cat,cin order to win they had to get Kittybout of the way.
124.title: some other crazy idea

1241.content: The villains debated the best way to stop a cat from stalking its pray, some said tricks, others said bear traps, some very weird ones said magic talking fish. But when a villain yelled out weight gain, everyone knew that's where it is. Although the means of doing so are very different from method to method. This sent everyone back into chaos where they all agreed on one thing and one thing only it had to be a slow process, one to distract TUFF while they put their plan into motion. After agreeing they all argued again until the same villain yelled out the perfect method of getting a fat cat...
1241.title: Weight gain

choices: Kitty stops, but only after gaining some weight.
12411.content:
"Hmm, what's this food doing here?" Kitty asked questioning the sudden surplus of unhealthy food that lined her cupboards and re-fridgerator. "Ehh." Kitty says, bored as she takes out a huge steak that's laced with a weight gain serum which doubled its fattening powers.

"Big deal, it's only twice as fat" snaptrap says as he looks through the telescope and into kitties apartment

"That may not seem like much but considering the huge amounts of fatty food that was just lazing around the house, it adds up quick." The villain explains "it doesn't need to be anything drastic, no need for anything that might trip off TUFF's alarm bells.

"Pssh, the evil talking fish from dinner past still would've worked better" snaptrap says while crossing his arms and then Sparta kicking Larry into a bottomless pit.

124112.content:
While the two villains debate the efficiency of this plan kitty katswell continues to eat. So far she has wolfed down a steak, cake, pie, and is starting on a tuna sandwich.

"The weight has been adding up, slowly but surely kitty has put on ten pounds in an hour of eating. This fat accumulated around her thighs and butt. This results in a half an inch difference on each of her thighs, and a slightly softer butt.

After finishing the sandwich kitty decides to hit the sack before eating anymore, she did have a figure to keep after all. So ash she lay there she dreamt of eating more food the following day
124112.title: Kitty stops, but only after gaining some weight.

choices: Kitty calls in sick to eat some more
1241121.content: "Raggem fraggem new villain, thinks he can show me, VERMINIOUS SNAPTRAP, up!?" He yells as he begins to sprinkle a large dosage on kitty's food "this'll show him." Even after all that he only managed to make it four times as fattening
1241121.title: Meanwhile at TUFF HQ

12411211.content:
Kitty walks into the TUFF building while holding her stomach. "What's wrong with me, skipping breakfast" kitty ponders out loud "I can't fight crime on an empty stomach".

She looks over to the break room and decides to take a "snack" break to hold her hunger back looking through her food she takes out two tuna fish, and a very appetizing salmon salad. Grabbing all of that she walks over to where she usually eats lunch and scarfs the food down as quickly as possible.while finishing the last of the food she hears a rip, a very distinct sound which causes her to look down, panic, and run to the bathroom.

There she finds the problem, a huge tear on her pants, it is only then when she notices her gain. Her thighs now hit 3 extra inches in diameter, and kitty's butt jiggles violently whenever she makes even the slightest movement. This time the weight went up, starting the beginning of a gut on kitty's formerly flat and feminine abs. Her abs are now three inches under a layer of fat and flab that shakes when kitty takes a breath in, which she loses a lot faster due to her new weight, and her chest has expanded greatly. Her bust expanded from a petite b-cup to DD cups. Ones that draw attention from all those who can see, and finally her cheeks also began to sink into a pudgy look.
12411211.title: Kitty eats the food

124112111.content:
"120 POUNDS!" Kitty yells as she checks the scale and realizes her gain

"AGENTS!" Someone yelled "help!"

Getting out of the bathroom, kitty sees an agent bing dragged out the window and into a giant robot. In shock she just stood there until the robot started to grab for her. She turns around and runs for some kind of cover, her newly fattened body jiggling all the way there. After she gets to an overturned table she sees her friends being targeted, so she runs (if you could call it that) over to them and manages to distract the robot. The robot then raises a giant raygun sort of weapon and aims it at Kitty as her friends escape.
124112111.title: Time for a mission!

1241121111.content:
The laser hits kitty and causes a change, subtle but still noticeable.

"Kitty!" Her partner, Dudley, hollers out as he runs back and drags her back to their hiding spot "ugh, why are you so heavy?!"

"Marvelous work gent puppy!" The chief says as Dudley drags Kitty into their haven "what in gods name happened to agent Katswell!?"

"The ray hit her" Dudley explains "I think it added all the...."

"Ugh...."

"Shh! Agent Ka-Ka-Ka-Katswells coming to" Keswick says

"What happened!" Kitty says examine her new, even larger body.

No one says anything as they examine Kitty's chubby body. Her thighs have now completely destroyed her pants and are seven inches in diameter. Along with her thighs expanding her butt has also gained some flab, it now jiggles even when sitting and is big enough to fill out and tear her already broken pants. Kitty then diverted her attention to her chest as it is now a EE that practically shredded her entire shirt, and her bra barely remains intact. The only reason she hasn't lost her balance is because her breasts are resting on a chubby stomach, which is now about 1 inch over whatever's left of her pants, and has buried her formerly flat abs under 6 inches of soft and flabby flesh that is stacked in a few rolls. Finally, her face has also gone through some changes. Starting with her having the beginning of a double chin that slightly shakes when talking. Kitty's cheeks are now fleshier and softer, sticking out right about to where the ends of her mouth are.

"I-I-... I." Kitty stammers, in a panic

"Don't worry, we can find a way to Fi-Fi-Fi-Fix you." Keswick says supportively

"Yeah!" The chief chimes in "if Keswick can make defective bombs than surely he can invent a barely functioning weight ray."

"But we also need to attempt a daring rescue mission... So, no offense but. Maybe you should stay here" Dudley says looking down at his feet

"But..." Kitty says sadly

"Agent puppy's right, this'll be too dangerous for you to go on" the chief explains "Sorry agent Katswell, but you can't leave"

"Fine." Kitty says, upset.

"Make sure to look through the clothing bin in the corner, your clothes are trashed" Dudley yells as they all leave

Kitty was really starving as the feline TUFF agent sat down and took a bite out of the food that Snaptrap had tampered with as she took a bite out of it as her eyes widened as she mentioned with a huge grin on her face "Oh my god this is the best thing ever!!" as Kitty started to greedily stuff her face like a ravenous animal as she'd already finished the food that Snaptrap had messed with.

"Oh my -BURP!!!- that was so good" Kitty moaned patting her belly that was getting even softer than before and was getting more of a big belly of blubber as she suddenly grabbed her phone and called The Chief "Chief; it's Kitty, I can't come in today, I, I" Kitty tried to think of an excuse as she finally blurted out "I've got a really bad cold, sorry" and before The Chief could even answer, Kitty slammed the phone down and started to look for more food to devour, her eyes were wild and crazed as she mentioned "Kitty needs more food!"

15333121.content: Are the effects gradual or instant?
15333121.title: She drinks a potion

153331212.content:
It was a quiet day at TUFF, and there wasn't much to do. Kitty walked into the empty employee lounge to get a drink. She walked over to the table and saw a cup with a clear liquid inside with a note on it that said "To Kitty". "That's strange" thought Kitty. She didn't know who left the cup there but thought nothing of it. She decides that since someone wanted her to have it, she should have it and she then sat down at the table and drank it.

Kitty was just getting up to leave when she suddenly felt weird. "Ohhh, what did I drink?" she wondered. She noticed that her tail felt tingly and when she turned and looked at it, it had turned into a mouse's tail. Kitty then felt her ears change into mouse ears and she started to get smaller. Soon Kitty had vanished and only her clothes, gloves and boots were left behind. Then a small mouse with Kitty's hairstyle crawled out of her sweater. "Whoa, what happened to me?" she gasped. Kitty could hear footsteps approaching and realized someone was coming.
153331212.title: Instant

15333222221.content:
It was an average day at TUFF, as we see Keswick in his lab working on labelling his ray guns. "Now, which one is the-" He stops as he accidentally fires one, as it ricochet's off the beakers in his lab as it goes straight for the door. At that moment, the door opened as Kitty walks in holding a piece of paper.

"Hey Keswick can you sign-" She stopped as she was hit by the blast, her body soon began to change. Her body started to grow in size, as her suit began to rip from it. Her fur began to shrink while her skin began to turn gray, as her nose grew long while her tail began to shrink. Her boots and gloves exploded as her claws and paws became big and hard. Her ears soon grew to the size of dinner plates, as she stood there her clothes tattered from her transformation.

"Well, now I know this is the Elephant-Blaster." Keswick remarked as he puts a label on it, while Kitty looked at her body in shock. In anger Kitty

15431.title: Changing panties.

choices: Kitty calmed down as she recognised Dudley
Kitty roared and began rampaging, She had no control of her actions
Kitty fell to the ground as she passed out from the transformation
1551.content:
Kitty Katswell had finally tracked down Snaptrap and the rest of D.O.O.M, Having previously spied on them enacting numerous robberies across Petropolis she intended to foil Snaptrap's latest plot.

"All right Snaptrap, What are you planning this time?" "Ah agent Katswell so kind of you to show up uninvited to my lair! Seriously we were having an ice cream social before putting our plan into motion but now you've spoiled the whole mood." Kitty looked around noticing a large table with tubs of ice cream and a surplus of cones as well as a banner reading "Our Next Big Plan". "I mean how rude can you get?" Snaptrap sighed as he shovelled a spoon full of ice cream into his mouth, "Anyway onto the capturing!" Snaptrap pressed a button on a remote he pulled out and a large table shot up from the ground lifting Kitty onto it and metal clamps locked her arms and legs into place.

Snaptrap laughed as he walked in front of Kitty, "Tell me what your up to Snaptrap! I know you stole that experimental laser but what doesn't make sense is all the broccoli and fitness supplements you stole." Snaptrap stopped laughing and looked at Kitty "Wow you've been watching us for a while, I know this is your job and everything but don't you have anything better to do?" "Not really cause taking down bad guys like you is the highlight of my week" Snaptrap looked at his henchmen confusedly and they looked back at him exactly the same, "Well agent Katswell since your so interested in my plan allow me to explain" Snaptrap pressed another button on his remote bringing down a large screen, Images shot by on the screen as Snaptrap explained his plan "The laser we stole was intended for DNA experimentation, y'know like enhancement or adding things to someone's DNA to help their immune system, I realised just how much of an asset a device like this could be and thus I began my latest ingenious plan, By supercharging all the broccoli we stole and mixing it with all those fitness supplements I have been able to create a component of supercharged strength enhancement!" Snaptrap reveals the component, A vial the size of a water bottle filled with a glowing green liquid, He continues to explain as he loads the vial into the laser "I'll zap my henchmen with this component and with my loyal super strong minions I Verminious Snaptrap will rule over all Petropolis!"

His maniacal laughter is cut short as the rooftop is smashed through "Not so fast Snaptrap!" Kitty's face lights up with happiness "Dudley!" Dudley lands a few feet away from Kitty "Hey Kitty! Don't worry I'll have you out in just a sec!" The rest of D.O.O.M surround Dudley and begin attacking.

Dudley fights off each of Snaptrap's henchmen sending them flying, One of them hits the laser causing it to turn and aim at Kitty, As Snaptrap begins panicking as his henchmen fall left and right Dudley begins sprinting directly at him, "Time to end your evil plan Snaptrap!" Dudley uppercuts Snaptrap sending him flying into the ice cream social table. Ice cream and broken cones fly in all directions as Snaptrap lifts himself to his knees "My plan, My marvellous plan has been thwarted before it even began!" Snaptrap then realises he's no longer holding the remote "Wait where'd the switch go?" Snaptrap the notices the device and Dudley turns to see it.

It fell on it's face pressing the button that activates the laser.

Kitty looks directly at the laser as it glow brighter and brighter as it prepares to fire, Kitty's eyes widen in shock "Uh oh" a large green beam fires from the laser completely enveloping Kitty, She screams in pain as the laser continues firing, Eventually the laser deactivates as the vial powering it was completely empty.

Kitty breaths heavily as the pain subsides, Dudley approaches Kitty "Kitty are you okay?" Dudley's worries are immediately dashed as Kitty begins growling, Her suit grows tighter as her muscles begin bulging, She snaps the metal clamps holding her to the table as she lands on the floor.

Wrestling with the growing pain inside her body Kitty comes to her knees, Her suit begins to tear as her muscles grow, Her gloves explode as her hands outgrow them, her belt flies off her waist as she begins growing larger, Kitty's legs and feet burst from her pants and boots as she roars with each spurt, The rest of her body follows as her arms, shoulders and torso tear through her clothes, All that remains of her suit are a loincloth and a rudimentary tank top from her destroyed jacket.

Kitty rises to her feet completely overshadowing Dudley and Snaptrap as she's grown to 10ft tall, As Kitty roars to the sky her black hair grows longer and unkempt snapping the hairband that made it a ponytail.

Dudley approaches Kitty yet again quaking in fear with every step, "K-Kitty?"

Kitty turns to Dudley, She was growling and her eyes were burning with pure fury.
1551.title: Rise of the Incredible Katswell

choices: Kitty is officially made the Brawn of T.U.F.F
Kitty becomes a superhero and enters an official partnership with T.U.F.F
15511.content:
"Dudley?" The flurry of anger and confusion disappeared as Kitty recognised her partner and close friend.

Happily seeing no need to be afraid Dudley calmly approached Kitty "Yeah Kitty it's me, Are you okay?"

With the pain of her transformation dispersed Kitty was free to feel the energy and strength running through her body "Yeah, Actually I feel great! I'm more energised than I've ever been in my life!" As Kitty stops focusing just on how she feels she finally acknowledges her major body adjustment, "And I mean holy cow just look at me! Forget Kitty Katswell, I'm Kitty Katswole!" She proudly proclaims as she flexes both of her enormous biceps "My muscles feel as though their solid concrete!" Continuing to flex and admire her body Kitty notices the table she was clamped to only moments ago and grins.

"Y'know if I'm as strong as I feel..." She begins as she stomps over to the table "..Then just imagine what I'm actually capable of!" Grabbing the table with one hand she tears if off the hinges connecting it to the floor without even trying, Dudley in complete awe of his friends strength calls out to her "That thing is made of solid steel! How does it feel?" Kitty turns back to Dudley as she crushes the steel table into a ball "It feels like paper!" She then tosses the ball into the air and then punts it through the roof, Dudley excitedly runs up to Kitty "That was awesome!" Sharing her friends excitement Kitty kneels down to get closer to Dudley still being just a head higher than him "It feels awesome buddy!" She says as she proudly flexes her right arm.

Kitty looks over to the floor and see's her tattered clothes, Standing up she fully notices the state of her current wardrobe, "It's a shame about my clothes though, That was my favourite outfit!" "Hey don't sweat it, Personally I think you wear the natural tattered look pretty well!" Kitty blushes at her friends compliment and proudly poses/flexes, "Well with a bombshell bod like this I can make anything look fabulous!" "Not to mention your hair!" Running her fingers through her hair Kitty is overjoyed by it's new natural style "Hey yeah this untamed style can work pretty well for me!"

As Kitty and Dudley laugh and celebrate her magnificent transformation Snaptrap begins crawling away trying not to alert either of his foes, Suddenly he hears loud stomping as a large shadow looms over him "And just where do you think you're going Snaptrap?" Before he can even say anything Kitty grabs Snaptrap by his collar and holds him up to eye level "You gonna come quietly? Or do you want to see what this cat's capable of now that she's a tiger?" Snaptrap just stays silent and whimpers "That's what I thought" She knelt down and beckoned Dudley over "C'mon Dudley! We're outta here!" She picks up Dudley and places him on her shoulder as she smashes through the wall of Snaptraps lair, Sprinting through the streets of Petropolis Kitty summons all the strength in her legs and leaps high above the city heading towards the prison, "Y'now Dudley, I think I'm gonna enjoy being a supercharged beefy Kittyhulk" Dudley hugs Kitty's face "And I'm gonna enjoy being with you through it all partner." Kitty and Dudley share a laugh as they continue soaring towards the prison.
15511.title: Kitty calmed down as she recognised Dudley

choices: Her old nemesis The Chameleon was robbing the bank of Petropolis
The remaining members of D.O.O.M were stealing from a chemical plant
155112.content:
A lot of things happened after Kitty's explosive transformation, Keswick ran experiments on Kitty's supercharged DNA and discovered that the transformation was permanent! A fact that greatly excited both her and Dudley, But it raised a new problem, T.U.F.F is a crime-fighting agency that specialises in espionage and with her new massive body stealth was no longer an option for Kitty.

Suddenly Dudley had an idea "Kitty is still a crime-fighter at heart and it would be a waste for her new super strength to simply do nothing with it so why not become a superhero? That way you can still fight bad guys and not have to do it secret agent style!" Everyone stared at Dudley it was a simple idea but it lined up perfectly with all the options presented to them, "And you can officially partner up with T.U.F.F so our resources can remain at your disposal!" The Chief said as he wheeled up to Kitty.

Looking around at her friends and all the support they were giving her Kitty smiled and stood up triumphantly "All right then.." Kitty said as she placed her hands on her hips, Posing heroically "..Looks like Petropolis has a new hero on the rise!"

Keswick unveiled a large chamber in his lab "I've made some major upgrades to the technology we use to assign your disguises, Agent Katswell if you step in here the chamber will allow you to design your own superhero outfit, No matter how you design it the material will be able to withstand your new, ahem, frame so it won't tear while in use" The thought of designing her own outfit got Kitty all giddy inside "Thank you so much Keswick! I'd hug you but I'm scared I might break you" "No hug necessary Agent Katswell the appreciation is already felt" With that Kitty entered the chamber eager to embrace her new future of super-heroics.

Dudley sat near the chamber, Clearly bored out of his mind "She's been in there for a whole hour!" "We can't rush her Agent Puppy, This is her career as a costumed crime-fighter, not ours, plus you've seen super hero's nowadays their costumes are so intricate and detailed, She must be having the time of her life in there!" "The Chief is right Agent Puppy, Once she steps out of that chamber Agent Katswell will begin a new major chapter in her life and we need to be ready to assist her in anyway we can" Suddenly the chamber doors opened as smoke poured out "I appreciate the support guys but don't call me Agent Katswell anymore."

Kitty stepped out of the chamber and her shadow loomed over her three friends, "Call me, Titanic Tigress! The super strong, Untamed Defender of Petropolis! And nemesis to all evildoers!" She exclaimed as she posed, flexing every muscle in her arms. Her new suit was bold, A purple leotard that had black tiger stripes on its back which wrapped around to her sides, A white belt around her waist with an orange capital T clasping it together, in the middle of her chest was another capital T which ended at her naval it was orange and accompanied by more black tiger stripes, Her whole head was covered in a purple mask, it had three holes in the front, Two for her eyes and one for her mouth, The mask had built in slots for her ears and an opening in the back for her shaggy mane-like hair, nothing covered her arms save for black finger-less gloves on her hands, And aside from two white sweatband like anklets nothing covered her legs.

Dudley stood in awe "Wow Kitty, you look awesome!" Kitty blushed at the adoration "Thanks, I was thinking about sleeves and leggings, But then I decided nothing should cover the greatness of these guns and pillars of pure power!" She growled proudly as she flexed her body, "And now I'm ready to defend the city of Petropolis!"

Suddenly alarms starting going off inside T.U.F.F, The Chief look at the monitor "It's a good thing too Agen- I mean Titanic Tigress because there's a robbery happening downtown!"

"I'm on it Chief! You hoping on Dudley?" "I better not we don't want the bad guys immediately figuring out who you are, I'll meet you down there" Dudley put his fist out as Kitty smiled "You got it, Partner" She lightly tapped Dudley's fist "Now Titanic Tigress away!" She exclaimed as she leapt through the roof of the building.

"Beware villains, Titanic Tigress is on the hunt!" She announced as she headed downtown.
155112.title: Titanic Tigress, Defender of Petropolis!

choices: Kitty sets her sights on Petropolis and rampages with unstoppable power
Kitty grabs Dudley and Snaptrap intending to make them her playthings
15512.content:
Completely ignoring her partner, Kitty clenched her fists and roared as she slammed the ground, Causing a shockwave that shook the ground and sent Dudley and Snaptrap flying.

"Kat..Swell... angry..." She said through gritted teeth as she turned her attention to the equipment in the lair "Katswell CRUSH!"

Kitty leapt into the air and came down with thunderous force cracking the ground around her as machinery shook from its foundations, She plunged her gigantic fist into a control console and tore it apart effortlessly as electricity shot out in all directions.

"She's destroying everything! My Lair! My beautiful lair!" Snaptrap cries as he watches the destruction, "This was your plan! Don't you have some idea how to stop this!?" Dudley says, panicking as he grabs Snaptrap, "Well I figured there was a possibility my henchmen would lose control like this so I created a prototype control collar, Follow me!" Snaptrap leads Dudley to the upper floors of the lair as Kitty continues to ravage the ground floor.

Opening a small safe Snaptrap reveals a circular collar with small electrodes sticking out of it, "It's a prototype but it should diminish any aggressive behaviour, All we have to do is get it on her neck." Dudley grabs the collar "Shouldn't be too hard" He and Snaptrap look back to the ground floor as Kitty is now slamming the metal table she was locked onto into the ground breaking it apart all the while she continues to roar.

"Okay, here goes nothing!" Dudley leaps off the railing towards Kitty, He lands directly on her back with his arms around her neck "Dog.. get off Katswell!" She yells as he tries to shake Dudley off "No can do Kitty, This is for your own good!" Dudley clamps the collar around Kitty's neck and leaps off as it begins to electrocute her.

Kitty roars in pain as powerful volts course through her body, Seeing his friend like this saddened Dudley but he knew it was necessary given the circumstances, However something shocking developed as Kitty began to power through the pain!

Grunting furiously Kitty managed to grab the collar around her neck and with her tremendous strength she snapped it to pieces! "Uh Snaptrap, Any other ideas!?" "I've got nothing Agent Puppy! But we have to go, NOW!"

The yelling immediately attracted Kitty's attention "Dog and Rat hurt Katswell..." She said stomping towards the two "Make Katswell MAD!" she roared as she suddenly begins grunting in pain, Coming down to her knees once again Kitty slams her hands to the ground as she begins to transform even more!

Her fingernails start to sharpen and grow into claws! Her hair grows even longer, Her body tears through what remains of her clothes as her muscles expand even further! As her fur grows shaggier and the growth continues the roars and grunts are slowly replaced with sinister chuckles and laughs.

Kitty slams her growing fist into the ground, Cracking it as she stands up, her shadow growing over Dudley and Snaptrap as she grows to 15ft tall and her muscles swell even larger.

Kitty continues to laugh as her teeth sharpen into fangs and her growth finally ceases, She looks downward at Dudley and Snaptrap with a sinister smile as she observes her newly transformed body "Hehehe Katswell bigger" Clenching her enlarged fist she punches the wall of the lair shaking everything, She flexes her right arm and admires her bicep "Katswell stronger!" She then leans down so her minuscule company is fully within eye sight "and Katswell smarter, Dudley and Snaptrap" Kitty then lifts her gargantuan foot and stomps the ground a few feet away from the two as she roars to the sky, "Katswell going to enjoy this!" she proclaims as she flexes every inch of her gigantic powerful body.
15512.title: Kitty roared and began rampaging, She had no co...
